paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Carried a frameshift deletion in the BRCA2 gene, causing a truncated protein product.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient 08 carried a frameshift deletion in the BRCA2 gene, causing a truncated protein product.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with a frameshift deletion leading to a truncated protein.

variants.additional_notes: The majority of patients with BRCA2 mutations had significant alterations.
key_quotes: We observed frameshift deletions and missense mutations in BRCA2 in 11 (39.3%) patients.
eight of whom (72.7%) harbored the 1114 C > A aberration.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
